Detailed Description

This intereface is used to create a plugin used by XINX. At start, XINX load all plugins and call the initializePlugin method from the plugin.

The plugin must define some attribute used to show informations to user (in about box and in the list of Plugin).

A plugin can return a list of tools (with a default value). This tool will be show in the customize dialog of XINX.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum IXinxPlugin::PluginAttribute

Information that can be asked to plugin

Enumerator:
PLG_NAME 

Name of the plugin.

PLG_DESCRIPTION 

Long description of the plugin.

PLG_ICON 

An icon that represent the plugin.

PLG_AUTHOR 

The author (or authors) of the plugin.

PLG_EMAIL 

Email to contact the author (or team).

PLG_WEBSITE 

The site where we can find the plugin.

PLG_VERSION 

The Version of the plugin.

PLG_LICENCE 

The Licence of the plugin.
